xml.title: 3 questions to employers
xml.relati: Poster (Great Britain. Parliamentary Recruiting Committee) ; no. 70.
xml.contri: Bemrose & Sons, printer.; Great Britain. Parliamentary Recruiting Committee, publisher.;
xml.descri: Text says that men are needed to enlist and employers could do things to encourage their men to enlist. No pictorial content.
xml.descra: Date based on dates of 1st World War. "Poster No. 70." Orientation: Vertical.
xml.subjec: World War, 1914-1918 -- Propaganda.; War posters -- Great Britain.; Great Britain -- Armed forces -- Recruiting, enlistment, etc. -- World War, 1914-1918.;
xml.rights: This material is made available for private study, scholarship, and research use. For access to the original or a high resolution reproduction, contact: Temple University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center, scrc@temple.edu, 215-204-8257.
xml.reposi: Temple University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center
xml.digitb: Allied Posters of World War I
xml.digita: 72 dpi, 24-bit color, scanned on a Contex Magnum50 drum scanner, 2000-2002, at 150 or 300 dpi based on poster size. Original higher resolution scans were not retained due to lack of available storage at time of ingest. Display images were sized as follows: portrait-shaped posters were given a uniform height of 500 pixels and landscape-shaped posters were given a uniform width of 625 pixels.
xml.tbd: Digitization of this item was originally supported by a congressionally directed grant administered by the Institute of Museum and Library Services. IMLS Project CL00002-00.
xml.ada: For Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA) accommodation, including help with reading this content, please contact diglib@temple.edu .
